jucyzhang

getInstance

public static RSFilterEngine getInstance(Context context)
create a new instance of RSFilterEngine.

参数：

addFilter

public RSFilterResult addFilter(RSFilter filter)
add a filter to the engine.

参数：
filter -
返回：
a RSFilterResult object holding future result of the filter. If you don't need the result anymore, clear the reference immediately for memory performance.

compute

public Bitmap compute()
compute all filters inside the engine

返回：
result Bitmap of the ***LAST*** filter in the engine.

getBitmapFromResult

retrieve the result inside the RSFilterResult

参数：
result -
返回：
the result Bitmap of filter.
